description: Curated open datasets: animal cancer, imaging, radiographs, vet practice (guidelines, resources). Ingested into DB for discovery.

items.title: Integrated Canine Data Commons (ICDC)
items.description: NCI open-access canine cancer data: clinical, genomic, transcriptomic. API available.

items.title: CATCH – Canine Cutaneous Cancer Histology (TCIA)
items.description: 350 histologic samples, seven canine cutaneous tumor types; high-res digital imaging.

items.title: Canine thoracic radiographs (VHS dataset)
items.description: 152 canine lateral thoracic radiographs (PNG); vertebral heart score; Mendeley Data, CC BY 4.0.

items.title: Canine/feline skull HRCT (figshare)
items.description: 431 animal skulls (dogs, cats, wild canids/felids); NIfTI format; comparative anatomy.

items.title: AAHA Guidelines
items.description: AAHA guidelines for canine/feline practice: wellness, vaccination, nutrition, pain management, dentistry, behavior.

items.title: AVMA Clinical Resources
items.description: AVMA clinical and practice resources, tools, and guidelines for veterinarians.

items.title: Veterinary Information Network (VIN) – Public
items.description: VIN: CE, drug formulary, differentials, and peer discussion (membership for full access).

items.title: Merck Veterinary Manual
items.description: Free online reference: species, conditions, therapeutics, diagnostics.
